About

As symbolized by the lotus which grows upward as it emerges from dark waters seeking the sun, destined to become a beautiful flower, Leah von Ahlburg seeks to rise above by being a fashion line that aspires to inspire.

Beyond being a fashion line that gives women a sense of comfort and style, we aspire to create a spirit of personal evolution and confidence to be who you are.
